hudson.plugins.sonar.SonarRunnerBuilder.properties:
# required metadata sonar.projectKey=acs:<%= @projectname %> sonar.projectName=<%= @projectname %> sonar.projectVersion=1.0
# path to source directories (required) sonar.sources=.
# Uncomment this line to analyse a project which is not a java project. # The value of the property must be the key of the language. #sonar.language=cobol
# Additional parameters #sonar.my.property=value
